snippet: The truth is, no one really knows exactly how — or why — the right-field foul pole in Fenway Park came to be known as the Pesky Pole.
abstract: Death of Johnny Pesky, former Boston Red Sox player, manager, coach, and broadcaster, has many people questioning how the right-field foul pole in Fenway Park came to be known as the Pesky Pole.
lead_paragraph: The truth is, no one really knows exactly how — or why — the right-field foul pole in Fenway Park came to be known as the Pesky Pole.

headline.seo: Origin of the Pesky Pole Feeds Red Sox Lore
headline.main: Tall Tale: Origin of the Pesky Pole Feeds Red Sox Lore
